directions: In a 3-quart heavy saucepan brown sausage over moderate heat and transfer with a slotted spoon to paper towels to drain. If there is more than 1 teaspoon fat in pan pour off excess; if there is less, add enough oil to measure 1 teaspoon fat. Cook garlic, stirring, until golden. Add onion and cook, stirring, until softened.
Add lentils, water, broth, and sausage and simmer, covered, 30 minutes. Add kale and simmer, uncovered, until tender, 5 to 7 minutes. Stir in vinegar and salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: a 2 1/2-inch piece smoked kielbasa, sliced thin
1/2 small bunch kale, stems and center ribs discarded and leaves sliced thin (about 2 cups)
title: Lentil, Kale, and Sausage Soup
